videoSnippet.title: WheN You Slice The Board in Half
videoSnippet.description:
Have a great day :)

Erigaisi Arjun (2675) - Shirov, Alexei (2695)
TePe Sigeman Chess Tournament (chess24.com) [1] 2022.05.03
D44 Queen's Gambit Declined semi-Slav, anti-Meran gambit

1.d4 d5 2.c4 c6 3.Nf3 Nf6 4.Nc3 e6 5.Bg5 dxc4 6.e4 b5 7.e5 h6 8.Bh4 g5 9.Nxg5 hxg5 10.Bxg5 Nbd7 11.exf6 Bb7 12.Be2 Nxf6 13.Bf3 Be7 14.g3 Qb6 15.O-O O-O-O 16.Qe2 Qxd4 17.Rfd1 Qc5 18.h4 Rhg8 19.Rxd8+ Bxd8 20.Bxf6 Bxf6 21.Ne4 Qe5 22.Nxf6 Qxf6 23.h5 Rd8 24.a4 c3 25.axb5 cxb2 26.Rb1 c5 27.Bc6 a5 28.Rxb2 a4 29.Rd2 a3 30.Ra2 Qc3 31.h6 Rh8 32.Qd1 Bxc6 33.bxc6 Qd4 34.Qb3 Qb4 35.Qd3 Rd8 36.Qa6+ Kc7 37.Rxa3 Qb1+ 38.Kg2 Rd1 39.Qa7+ Kxc6 40.Qa8+ Kd6 41.h7

00:00 Hello Everyone!
01:10 Game Starts!
03:00 Completely New Game!
10:30 It Was In This Position
12:25 Contributions

The TePe Sigeman Chess Tournament is an 8-player single round-robin tournament taking place from 3-9 May 2022 in Malmo, Sweden. There are no tiebreaks or playoffs.

Players receive 90 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 30 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment starting from move one. No draw offers are allowed before move 41. Official website: www.tepesigemanchess.com
